item.title: FFTs over time and space... and devices
item.description: Q. How do available FFT routines compare over different libraries and accelerator hardwares? This is something I have wondered for sometime, though it can be difficult for an apples-to-apples comparison. I will consider the above question in relation to the following plan: Comparing FFT implementations in a pseudospectral solver for linear and nonlinear Schrodinger equation dynamics To decide on how to proceed, it is instructive to list all (or most) widely known and used implementations.
